name: Geo Stretch
description:
You control a square with eating issues. The square gets bigger and bigger by the second. You're goal is to maneuver it out of the room to the green finish platform. If it gets too big, it'll explode! Every five levels, you get a save point. Sometimes the square will grow in different directions too! Good luck!

*Current* Easy Mode Glitchless% WR:  56.39
